committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to modernize the Federal Reserve System.

summary.text: Federal Reserve Modernization Act - Amends the Federal Reserve Act to eliminate the Federal Open Market Committee and place authority for the conduct of open-market operations in the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System, in consultation with the Federal Reserve District Bank Presidents. Requires such operations to be governed with a view to reducing inflation and preventing recession by establishing the growth of the money supply as specified in this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to modernize the Federal Reserve System.
